title: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Blue Plaid
medium: Brush and tones of blue watercolor (gouache?) on off-white coated wove paper
description: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) design for decorated paper: basket weave or plaid pattern  in tones of blue  (grid formed of darker blue; interior box spaces are lighter blue tone].  Image made by "combed" technique akin to finger painting.
name: Drawing
